login-link-text: The text for the 'Login' button at the top of the page when the user is not logged in.
wiki-input-label: The label for the 'wiki' option on the tool.
wiki-input-description: A short description for the 'wiki' option on the tool.
users-input-label: The label for the 'users' option on the tool.
users-input-description: A short description for the 'users' option on the tool.
subject-input-label: The label for the 'subject' option on the tool.
subject-input-description: A short description for the 'subject' option on the tool.
body-input-label: The label for the 'body' option on the tool.
body-input-description: A short description for the 'body' option on the tool.
ccme-checkbox-label: The label for the checkbox to also send copies of emails to the sender.
submit-text: Text for a generic submit button.
report-bug-link-text: The text for the link to report a bug.
logout-link-text: The text for the 'Logout' button when the user clicks on their name.
index-welcome-description: A short description of the 'MassMailer' tool.
index-welcome-login: A link to the login page from the index.
oauth-callback-failed-text: Error message displayed when OAuth callback failed - usually caused by cookies being disabled.
login-fail-text: Error message displayed when authentication fails.
login-success-text: Success message displayed when a user logs in.
logout-text: Message displayed to the user when they log out.
save-text: Text for a generic save button.
